channel.title: Is it possible to build something like this...?
channel.description:
Hi, I would like to start a project very soon.I have been studying server coding for a while now and I think I'm ready. I will either name it TowerScape (please tell me if already used), or DungeonScape.
For towers, is it possibly to make like a 6-7+ story building? Client side? If so, any tuts/links? Is it easy? A brief explanation please, thanks?
:)

item.title: Is it possible to build something like this...?
item.dc:creator: @tj007razor tj007razor
item.description:
@tj007razor wrote:

[quote=“Play N Skillz, post:11, topic:92370”]I think if you added random tellies for one Object, it would pick random and you would never know where its going to tele you to out of those options. Kinda like barrows monsters, or the chest, item I.D.'s are all set in there, but you achieve them random and never know what you’re going to get…

Please, keep the ideas coming… I love em! :)[/quote]

If you did what I said, and add the coords, then the ladder’s tele would not be random. You can hard code each teleport for certain coords as you wish, not random.

Read full topic
item.source: Is it possible to build something like this...?

item.description:
@Play_N_Skillz wrote:

I don’t think I would like that very much sorry to say. I planned out all my floors in webdesign and really hope this will work. Thank you soo much for posting though.

Read full topic

item.source: Is it possible to build something like this...?

item.title: Is it possible to build something like this...?
item.dc:creator: @Play_N_Skillz Play N Skillz
item.description:
@Play_N_Skillz wrote:

Not concerned with lag, I’m paying for A webhoster. I think if you added random tellies for one Object, it would pick random and you would never know where its going to tele you to out of those options. Kinda like barrows monsters, or the chest, item I.D.'s are all set in there, but you achieve them random and never know what you’re going to get…

Please, keep the ideas coming… I love em!

Read full topic

item.source: Is it possible to build something like this...?

item.title: Is it possible to build something like this...?
item.dc:creator: @andrew1234321 andrew1234321
item.description:
@andrew1234321 wrote:

[quote=“mod robby, post:3, topic:92370”][quote author=tj007razor link=topic=134338.msg1296489#msg1296489 date=1178861670]
you probly could do what real rs does…when you click on a ladder it will tele you somewhere else (in your case just another story to your building). What I mean is, instead of actually making it really tall, you could make it one story but make it seem really tall by instead of going up, you get tele’d somewhere else
[/quote]

I don’t think that would work because you could only code one telly for the ladder. You could make one story a ladder, another a stair case, another a blue portal,another a red portal. and just set the tellys on it. Or you could code a client that worked with ladders… That would be hard…[/quote]

not true, u can have multiple teles for 1 object id. Just make it the coordinates for that object, tele u to x…

Read full topic
item.source: Is it possible to build something like this...?

item.title: Is it possible to build something like this...?
item.dc:creator: @tj007razor tj007razor
item.description:
@tj007razor wrote:

mod robby:

I don’t think that would work because you could only code one telly for the ladder. You could make one story a ladder, another a stair case, another a blue portal,another a red portal. and just set the tellys on it. Or you could code a client that worked with ladders… That would be hard…

Actually you could code many tele’s for an object, you just need to do this…

if (objectID == (object) && (objectX == (Xcoords)) && (objectY == (Ycoords)))

That way, when you tele, each ladder would do exactly what you want it to, so you can code multiple teles for an object

Read full topic
item.source: Is it possible to build something like this...?

What I mean is, instead of actually making it really tall, you could make it one story but make it seem really tall by instead of going up, you get tele’d somewhere else[/quote] yeah which might be hard to find rooms with the right ammout of size…but might work.

@mod_robby wrote:

you probly could do what real rs does…when you click on a ladder it will tele you somewhere else (in your case just another story to your building). What I mean is, instead of actually making it really tall, you could make it one story but make it seem really tall by instead of going up, you get tele’d somewhere else

I don’t think that would work because you could only code one telly for the ladder. You could make one story a ladder, another a stair case, another a blue portal,another a red portal. and just set the tellys on it. Or you could code a client that worked with ladders… That would be hard…
